name: Z-LESTIAL
description:
Reach the end of the track high up in the sky and fly off onto the higher plane! Greatness awaits you!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys to move left and right
  • Collect crystal to keep your speed

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

  • Code, Houdini, Environment Design: Linsey Raymaekers
  • Character Design: Tank Thunderbird
  • Design, Music, UI: Ali Reder

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Tools:

  • Unity3D
  • Houdini
  • ZBrush Core
  • Launchpad

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Assets:

  • Fantasy Skybox FREE 1.6.0 and Path Creator V 1.2
